docs.description:
The user absorbs energy and sharply raises its
Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats on the next turn.
docs.name: Geomancy

docs.description:
The user manipulates magnetic fields, which raises
the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with
the Plus or Minus Ability.
docs.name: Magnetic Flux

docs.description:
Using Happy Hour doubles the amount of prize
money received after battle.
docs.name: Happy Hour

docs.description:
The user electrifies the ground for five turns,
powering up Electric-type moves. Pokémon on the
ground no longer fall asleep.
docs.name: Electric Terrain

docs.description:
The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a
powerful flash.
docs.name: Dazzling Gleam

docs.description: The Pokémon congratulates you on your special day!
docs.name: Celebrate

docs.description:
The user and an ally hold hands. This makes them
very happy.
docs.name: Hold Hands

docs.description:
The user stares at the target with its baby-doll
eyes, which lowers its Attack stat. This move always
goes first.
docs.name: Baby-Doll Eyes

docs.description:
The user attacks by nuzzling its electrified cheeks
against the target. This also leaves the target
with paralysis.
docs.name: Nuzzle

docs.description:
The user holds back when it attacks, and the target
is left with at least 1 HP.
docs.name: Hold Back

docs.description:
The target is infested and attacked for four to five
turns. The target can’t flee during this time.
docs.name: Infestation

docs.description:
Striking opponents over and over makes the user’s
fists harder. Hitting a target raises the Attack stat.
docs.name: Power-Up Punch

docs.description:
The user absorbs its target’s HP. The user’s HP is
restored by over half of the damage taken by
the target.
docs.name: Oblivion Wing

docs.description:
This move also hits opposing Pokémon that are in
the air. Those Pokémon are knocked down to
the ground.
docs.name: Thousand Arrows

docs.description:
The user attacks with a wave that crawls along the
ground. Those hit can’t flee from battle.
docs.name: Thousand Waves

docs.description:
The user gathers the energy of the land and focuses
that power on opposing Pokémon to damage them.
docs.name: Land’s Wrath

docs.description:
Drawing power from the Eternal Flower, the user
fires a powerful beam of light. This also damages the
user quite a lot.
docs.name: Light of Ruin

docs.description:
The user attacks opposing Pokémon with countless
beams of light that glow a deep and brilliant blue.
docs.name: Origin Pulse

docs.description:
The user attacks opposing Pokémon by manifesting
the power of the land in fearsome blades of stone.
docs.name: Precipice Blades

docs.description:
After soaring upward, the user attacks its target by
dropping out of the sky at high speeds. But it lowers
its own Defense and Sp. Def stats in the process.
docs.name: Dragon Ascent

docs.description:
Using its many arms, the user unleashes a barrage of
attacks that ignore the effects of moves like Protect
and Detect. But the user’s Defense stat falls.
docs.name: Hyperspace Fury

docs.description:
The user builds up its momentum using its Z-Power
and crashes into the target at full speed. The power
varies, depending on the original move.
docs.name: Breakneck Blitz

docs.description: Dummy Data
docs.name: Breakneck Blitz

docs.description:
The user rams an energy orb created by its Z-Power
into the target with full force. The power varies,
depending on the original move.
docs.name: All-Out Pummeling

docs.description: Dummy Data
docs.name: All-Out Pummeling

docs.description:
The user soars up with its Z-Power and plummets
toward the target at full speed. The power varies,
depending on the original move.
docs.name: Supersonic Skystrike

docs.description: Dummy Data
docs.name: Supersonic Skystrike

docs.description:
The user creates a poisonous swamp using its
Z-Power and sinks the target into it at full force.
The power varies, depending on the original move.
docs.name: Acid Downpour

docs.description: Dummy Data
docs.name: Acid Downpour

docs.description:
The user burrows deep into the ground and slams
into the target with the full force of its Z-Power.
The power varies, depending on the original move.
docs.name: Tectonic Rage

docs.description: Dummy Data
docs.name: Tectonic Rage

docs.description:
The user summons a huge rock mountain using its
Z-Power and drops it onto the target with full force.
The power varies, depending on the original move.
docs.name: Continental Crush

docs.description: Dummy Data
docs.name: Continental Crush

docs.description:
The user binds the target with full force with
threads of silk that the user spits using its Z-Power.
The power varies, depending on the original move.
docs.name: Savage Spin-Out

docs.description: Dummy Data
docs.name: Savage Spin-Out

docs.description:
Deep-seated grudges summoned by the user’s
Z-Power trap the target. The power varies,
depending on the original move.
docs.name: Never-Ending Nightmare

docs.description: Dummy Data
docs.name: Never-Ending Nightmare

docs.description:
The user spins very fast and rams into the target
with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies,
depending on the original move.
docs.name: Corkscrew Crash

docs.description: Dummy Data
docs.name: Corkscrew Crash

docs.description:
The user breathes a stream of intense fire toward
the target with the full force of its Z-Power.
The power varies depending on the original move.
docs.name: Inferno Overdrive

docs.description: Dummy Data
docs.name: Inferno Overdrive

docs.description:
The user creates a huge whirling current using
its Z-Power to swallow the target with full force.
The power varies, depending on the original move.
docs.name: Hydro Vortex

docs.description: Dummy Data
docs.name: Hydro Vortex

docs.description:
The user collects energy from plants using its
Z-Power and attacks the target with full force.
The power varies, depending on the original move.
docs.name: Bloom Doom

docs.description: Dummy Data
docs.name: Bloom Doom

docs.description:
The user hits the target with a powerful electric
current collected by its Z-Power. The power varies,
depending on the original move.
docs.name: Gigavolt Havoc

docs.description: Dummy Data
docs.name: Gigavolt Havoc

docs.description:
The user controls the target with its Z-Power and
hurts the target with full force. The power varies,
depending on the original move.
docs.name: Shattered Psyche

docs.description: Dummy Data
docs.name: Shattered Psyche

docs.description:
The user dramatically drops the temperature using
its Z-Power and freezes the target with full force.
The power varies, depending on the original move.
docs.name: Subzero Slammer

docs.description: Dummy Data
docs.name: Subzero Slammer

docs.description:
The user materializes its aura using its Z-Power and
attacks the target with full force. The power varies,
depending on the original move.
docs.name: Devastating Drake

docs.description: Dummy Data
docs.name: Devastating Drake

docs.description:
The user gathers dark energy using its Z-Power
and sucks the target into it. The power varies,
depending on the original move.
docs.name: Black Hole Eclipse

docs.description: Dummy Data
docs.name: Black Hole Eclipse

docs.description:
The user creates a very charming space using its
Z-Power and totally toys with the target. The power
varies, depending on the original move.
docs.name: Twinkle Tackle

docs.description: Dummy Data
docs.name: Twinkle Tackle

docs.description:
The user, Pikachu, surrounds itself with the
maximum amount of electricity using its Z-Power
and pounces on its target with full force.
docs.name: Catastropika

docs.description:
The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores
more HP in a sandstorm.
docs.name: Shore Up

docs.description:
Although this move has great power, it only works
the first turn the user is in battle.
docs.name: First Impression

docs.description:
In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this
move also poisons any attacker that makes
direct contact.
docs.name: Baneful Bunker

docs.description:
The user attacks while simultaneously stitching the
target’s shadow to the ground to prevent the target
from escaping.
docs.name: Spirit Shackle

docs.description:
The user swings both arms and hits the target.
The target’s stat changes don’t affect this
attack’s damage.
docs.name: Darkest Lariat

docs.description:
The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles.
Any Pokémon suffering from a burn will be healed
by the touch of these bubbles.
docs.name: Sparkling Aria

docs.description:
The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist.
It lowers the user’s Speed, however.
docs.name: Ice Hammer

docs.description:
The user restores the target’s HP by up to half of its
max HP. It restores more HP when the terrain
is grass.
docs.name: Floral Healing

docs.description:
The user fiercely attacks the target using its
entire body.
docs.name: High Horsepower

docs.description:
The user restores its HP by the same amount as the
target’s Attack stat. It also lowers the target’s
Attack stat.
docs.name: Strength Sap

docs.description:
In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light and
fills a blade with the light’s energy, attacking the
target on the next turn.
docs.name: Solar Blade

docs.description: The user attacks by pelting the target with leaves.
docs.name: Leafage

docs.description:
The user shines a spotlight on the target so that
only the target will be attacked during the turn.
docs.name: Spotlight

docs.description:
The user shoots poisonous threads to poison the
target and lower the target’s Speed stat.
docs.name: Toxic Thread

docs.description:
The user concentrates intensely. The attack on the
next turn always results in a critical hit.
docs.name: Laser Focus

docs.description:
The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and
Sp. Atk stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or
Minus Ability.
docs.name: Gear Up

docs.description:
The user attacks the target’s throat, and the
resultant suffering prevents the target from using
moves that emit sound for two turns.
docs.name: Throat Chop

docs.description:
The user attacks the enemy with a pollen puff that
explodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a
pollen puff that restores its HP instead.
docs.name: Pollen Puff

docs.description:
The user entangles the target with its anchor chain
while attacking. The target becomes unable to flee.
docs.name: Anchor Shot

docs.description:
This protects Pokémon on the ground from priority
moves and powers up Psychic-type moves for
five turns.
docs.name: Psychic Terrain

docs.description:
The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with
full force. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.
docs.name: Lunge

docs.description:
The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This
also lowers the target’s Defense stat.
docs.name: Fire Lash

docs.description:
The user boasts its strength and attacks the target.
The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the
move’s power.
docs.name: Power Trip

docs.description:
To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out.
After using this move, the user will no longer be
Fire type.
docs.name: Burn Up

docs.description: The user exchanges Speed stats with the target.
docs.name: Speed Swap

docs.description:
The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. This
attack never misses.
docs.name: Smart Strike

docs.description:
The user heals the target’s status condition. If the
move succeeds, it also restores the user’s own HP.
docs.name: Purify

docs.description:
The user attacks the target by dancing very hard.
The user’s type determines the type of this move.
docs.name: Revelation Dance

docs.description:
If the Pokémon the user has inflicted damage on
have already used their moves, this move eliminates
the effect of the target’s Ability.
docs.name: Core Enforcer

docs.description:
The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on
the target. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.
docs.name: Trop Kick

docs.description:
The user instructs the target to use the target’s last
move again.
docs.name: Instruct

docs.description:
The user first heats up its beak, and then it attacks
the target. Making direct contact with the Pokémon
while it’s heating up its beak results in a burn.
docs.name: Beak Blast

docs.description:
The user rubs the scales on its entire body and
makes a huge noise to attack the opposing Pokémon.
The user’s Defense stat goes down after the attack.
docs.name: Clanging Scales

docs.description:
The user uses its body like a hammer to attack the
target and inflict damage.
docs.name: Dragon Hammer

docs.description:
The user swings its body around violently to inflict
damage on everything in its vicinity.
docs.name: Brutal Swing

docs.description:
This move reduces damage from physical and
special moves for five turns. This can be used only
in a hailstorm.
docs.name: Aurora Veil

docs.description:
The user, Decidueye, creates countless arrows
using its Z-Power and shoots the target with
full force.
docs.name: Sinister Arrow Raid

docs.description:
The user, Incineroar, strengthens its body using
its Z-Power and crashes into the target with
full force.
docs.name: Malicious Moonsault

docs.description:
The user, Primarina, summons a massive amount of 
water using its Z-Power and attacks the target with 
full force.
docs.name: Oceanic Operetta

docs.description:
The user, the Land Spirit Pokémon, obtains Alola’s
energy using its Z-Power and attacks the target with
full force. This reduces the target’s HP greatly.
docs.name: Guardian of Alola

docs.description:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Marshadow,
punches and kicks the target consecutively
with full force.
docs.name: Soul-Stealing 7-Star Strike

docs.description:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Alolan Raichu,
attacks the target with full force. This move leaves
the target with paralysis.
docs.name: Stoked Sparksurfer

docs.description:
Z-Power brings out the true capabilities of the user,
Snorlax. The Pokémon moves its enormous body
energetically and attacks the target with full force.
docs.name: Pulverizing Pancake

docs.description:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Eevee, gets
energy from its evolved friends and boosts its
stats sharply.
docs.name: Extreme Evoboost

docs.description:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Mew, attacks
the target with full force. The terrain will be charged
with psychic energy.
docs.name: Genesis Supernova

docs.description:
The user sets a shell trap. If the user is hit by a
physical move, the trap will explode and inflict
damage on the opposing Pokémon.
docs.name: Shell Trap

docs.description:
The user unleashes a strong beam. The attack’s
recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
docs.name: Fleur Cannon

docs.description:
The user bites the target with its psychic
capabilities. This can also destroy Light Screen
and Reflect.
docs.name: Psychic Fangs

docs.description:
Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. If
the user’s previous move has failed, the power of
this move doubles.
docs.name: Stomping Tantrum

docs.description:
The user attacks by beating the target with a
bone that contains a spirit. This may also lower
the target’s Defense stat.
docs.name: Shadow Bone

docs.description:
The user smashes into the target at high speed.
This move always goes first.
docs.name: Accelerock

docs.description:
The user slams into the target using a full-force
blast of water. This may also lower the target’s
Defense stat.
docs.name: Liquidation

docs.description:
The user shoots powerful lasers using the power of
a prism. The user can’t move on the next turn.
docs.name: Prismatic Laser

docs.description:
The user hides in the target’s shadow, steals
the target’s stat boosts, and then attacks.
docs.name: Spectral Thief

docs.description:
The user slams into the target with the force of a
meteor. This move can be used on the target 
regardless of its Abilities.
docs.name: Sunsteel Strike

docs.description:
The user emits a sinister ray to attack the target.
This move can be used on the target regardless of 
its Abilities.
docs.name: Moongeist Beam

docs.description:
The user gets teary eyed to make the target lose
its combative spirit. This lowers the target’s
Attack and Sp. Atk stats.
docs.name: Tearful Look

docs.description:
A strong electric blast crashes down on the target,
giving it an electric shock. This may also make the
target flinch.
docs.name: Zing Zap

docs.description:
The user hits the target with the force of nature.
It halves the target’s HP.
docs.name: Nature’s Madness

docs.description:
Cloaking itself in high energy, the user slams into the
target. The memory held determines the move’s type.
docs.name: Multi-Attack

docs.description:
The user, Pikachu wearing a cap, powers up a jolt of
electricity using its Z-Power and unleashes it.
Critical hits land more easily.
docs.name: 10,000,000 Volt Thunderbolt
